title: The EC Horror Library of the 1950's
description: Title as On The EC Horror Library of the 1950'sOn Horror Comics of the 1950'sOverersized Hardcover Edition (14" by 10") of Horror Comics by EC Comics. A Collection of 23 Full Color Reprints of Classic EC Horror Comics. This is a rollicking salute to the Ghastly, Horrific and Just Plain Wonderful EC Comics Stories. A Big Delightful Collection that predates the Russ Cochran Collections of the 1980's.
author: Ron Barlow
